Arizona Winter School 2012: Ramification and Geometry

The 2012 AWS was held March 10-14, 2012, at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Schedule and other important information
  • Organizers: Bryden Cais and Rachel Pries (main program), with Matt Papanikolas, Fernando Rodriguez-Villegas, David Savitt, and Dinesh Thakur.

Courses:
